data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Uroševac, Kosovo to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Uroševac, Kosovo
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 361 believers in Uroševac.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 361 believers in Uroševac that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Uroševac. Through your servants plant 37 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Albanian people.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Uroševac, Kosovo.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 361 believers living in Uroševac, Kosovo.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Uroševac, Kosovo today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

location.name: Uroševac
location.cities_list: Tetovo, Čair, Ferizaj, Kisela Voda, Gjorče Petro
location.cities_list_w_pop: Tetovo (72,944), Čair (64,773), Ferizaj (59,504), Kisela Voda (58,216), Gjorče Petro (41,000)
